document.full_text: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu said on wednesday that israel will act aggressively and responsibly to preserve quiet and security after violence with palestinians escalated over the past week.
document.title: israel will act aggressively to preserve security: pm
lines_and_colors: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu said on wednesday that israel will act aggressively and responsibly to preserve quiet and security after violence with palestinians escalated over the past week.
